TextView.android:text: With this mobile app you can tag your the trees you planted in your area on the Google Maps. Log on into this app and be a part of the global campaign. Check all the national and international organisations who participated in the plantation drive; check where and how many trees have been planted around the world on Guru Nanak's 550th anniversary. Checkout our video tutorials by tree expert, Balwinder Lakhewali to learn more about trees in Gurbani and Punjab's other native trees; their benefits, how to select and plant a tree as per location etc. Additionally you can download posters, banners and designs for this international campaign.
